net.kuujo.vertigo.context

Interface OutputStreamContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context<OutputStreamContext>, JsonSerializable, Observable<OutputStreamContext>

    public interface OutputStreamContext
extends Context<OutputStreamContext>
    The output stream context represents a set of output connections from one component instance to all instances of another component. The context contains information about how to dispatch messages between the group of target component instances.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<OutputConnectionContext> connections()
      Returns a list of output connections.
      OutputPortContext port()
      Returns the parent output port context.
      Selector selector()
      Returns the stream connection selector.
